selection_reasoning: Carrying forward two top historical performers to exploit (trial_7_7, trial_5_0), the best Gen8 density-weighted penalized method for potential (trial_8_0), and two diverse approaches—projection-based alternating (trial_8_4) and constrained trust-constr (trial_8_5)—to maintain methodological breadth.

trial_selections.reasoning: Best overall performer (score=2.635868). Strong annealed penalized L-BFGS-B + LP finalization baseline to exploit further with more starts and refined seeding.
Second-best historical (score=2.635797). Independent high-quality variant likely differing in schedule/initialization, offering a strong alternative baseline.
Best of Gen8 (score=2.609448) using annealing + local-density weights + LP. Promising direction with potential gains via more starts and weight tuning.
Projection-based alternating (Dykstra-like) with LP (score=2.379378). Valuable methodological diversity; can improve with better sweep ordering and relaxation.
Constrained trust-constr with analytic Jacobians (score=0.575631). Though low-scoring now, it adds an explicit constraint approach that can benefit from improved seeding and tolerances.
